author: USA TODAY, Kevin Johnson, USA TODAY
title: Federal prison system expands virus testing to find hidden asymptomatic infections
description: The federal prison system has been confronted with mounting infections and deaths attributed to the coronavirus.
content:
WASHINGTON The federal prison system, confronted with mounting infections and deaths attributed to the coronavirus, is expanding testing to seek out previously hidden asymptomatic inmates in an attempt to control the spread.
